ability.flavor: In a swirl of black ash, you step from one place to another.

metadata.flavor: In a swirl of black ash, you step from one place to another.

effects.effect: You teleport up to 5 squares. If you have concealment or cover at your destination, you can use the Hide maneuver even if you are observed. If you successfully hide using this maneuver, you gain 1 surge.
You teleport 1 additional square for each insight spent.
